name: Buy me
description: Buy me is a self-selling artwork, designed to exist in the environment of the NFT market. It uses a mind and emotion manipulation language to convince its viewer to buy it and collect it. Considering the artist as a streetwalker on the art market, Buy me delegates the selling task to the artwork itself. It embodies a rudimentary artificial entity that manipulates performative language to advertise itself. Until the end of times... More on www.antoineschmitt.com/buy-me/
